message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. This is a fair price considering its worth to me. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $12000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17000. This still reflects the value of the product for me, but it shows I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. Can you consider that price?
